title: Era of the Tyrant Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: 踏雪真人
description: I only have two kinds of enemies, those who have surrendered and those who are dead. I also only have two kinds of friends, those who are dead and those who are afraid of dying. My name is Gao Zhengyang and within this Manhuang world, I am he who is the most tyrannical.>
